channel.title: Times of India
channel.description: The Times of India: Breaking news, views, reviews, cricket from across India
channel.copyright: Copyright:(C) 2014 Bennett Coleman & Co. Ltd, http://info.indiatimes.com/terms/tou.html

item.title: Chinese copters drop food for their soldiers in Ladakh as stand-off continues
item.description: Sources said helicopters regularly air dropped food packets for the Chinese army numbering around 600 at the three areas in Chumar, 300 km east of Leh.

item.title: Xi in Delhi: China joins hands with India to upgrade rail infrastructure
item.description: Indian Railways joined hands with China to increase speed in its existing rail network, modernize stations and enhance mutual cooperation.

item.title: Scots vote on independence, United Kingdom's fate on knife-edge
item.description: Scotland voted on whether to stay within the Uk or end the 307-year-old union with England and become an independent nation in a finely balanced referendum.

item.title: Bonanza for Indian flyers: Airlines offer flash sales and discounts
item.description: It's raining bonanzas for domestic and international air travellers, with several Indian and foreign carriers offering flash sales and discounts to attract the growing number of Indian flyers.

item.title: Split on the cards? BJP gives ultimatum to Shiv Sena over seat-sharing
item.description: Setting itself on a confrontation path with its oldest ally, BJP gave Shiv Sena an ultimatum to agree on a seat-sharing formula for the coming polls or face a break-up of the alliance.
